EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending JAX Germany 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at JAX Germany <[[https://jax.de/]]>2017. We hope you learned something new about how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/]]>, a great public cloud for running microservices Spring Framework (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry! Don’t forget to check out the free eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks]]> we have for you on Cloud Native applications, microservices, and much more.
In case you missed any of the conference talks, here’s a quick recap:
- Cloud-native Java <[[https://jax.de/session/montag-08-05-2017-cloud-native-java-the-workshop/]]> (the Workshop) with Josh Long, Pivotal - Cloud-native Java <[[https://jax.de/session/cloud-native-java/]]> - Josh Long, Pivotal - Spring Framework 5 Themes and Trends <[[https://jax.de/session/from-zero-to-hero-with-spring-boot/]]>, Stéphane Nicoll, Pivotal - Sneak Peek on Spring Data "Kay" <[[https://jax.de/session/sneak-peek-on-spring-data-kay/]]> Christoph Strobl, Pivotal - Next Level Spring Boot Tooling <[[https://jax.de/session/next-level-spring-boot-tooling/]]>, Martin Lippert, Pivotal
And quite a lot of cool talks from the community on Spring as well!
- Reactive Spring <[[https://jax.de/session/montag-08-05-2017-reactive-spring/]]> - Michael Plod, InnoQ Germany GmbH - Microservices Workshop: Architecture and Technology <[[https://jax.de/session/montag-08-05-2017-microservices-workshop-architektur-und-technik/]]> - Eberhard Wolff, innoQ Germany GmbH - Microservices with Spring Boot, Angular 2 and Docker <[[https://jax.de/session/microservices-mit-spring-boot-angular-2-und-docker/]]> - Kai Tödter , Siemens AG - Spring Cloud DataFlow: Event-driven Stream and Batch Processing <[[https://jax.de/session/spring-cloud-data-flow-event-driven-stream-batch-processing/]]> - Nicolas Byl, codecentric - The meaning and benefit of RESTful Hypermedia APIs <[[https://jax.de/session/sinn-und-nutzen-von-restful-hypermedia-apis/]]> - Kai Tödter, Siemens AG - Workshop: Cool web apps with Spring Boot, Angular 2 and TypeScript <[[https://jax.de/session/freitag-12-05-2017-coole-web-apps-mit-spring-boot-angular-2-und-typescript/]]> - Kai Tödter, Siemens AG - Safe in the cloud with Angular 2 and Spring Boot <[[https://jax.de/session/sicher-in-die-cloud-mit-angular-2-und-spring-boot/]]> - Andreas Falk, NovaTec Consulting GmbH - Spring Batch Performance Monitoring <[[https://jax.de/session/spring-batch-performance-monitoring-wir-bringen-licht-in-die-dunkelverarbeitung/]]> - We bring light into the dark processing - Christian Nockemann, viadee IT company consulting - Microservices with Spring Cloud and Spring Boot <[[https://jax.de/session/microservices-mit-spring-cloud-und-spring-boot/]]> - Eberhard Wolff, innoQ Germany GmbH
Hungry for the latest from Pivotal?

Kind regards, Ines Schuller Account Executive Pivotal ischuller@pivotal.io
